examples.en: She complained of sexual harassment by the manager.
She was constantly harassed by the other students.
He claims that he is being unfairly harassed by the police.
It takes a lot of nerve to report a colleague for sexual harassment.
Employees are urged not to be shy about reporting incidents of sexual harassment.
The troops harrassed the defeated army throughout its retreat.
Mr Singh has strongly denied the allegations of sexual harassment.
Several senators introduced legislation aimed at sexual harassment.
She has endured house arrest and continual harassment by the police.
African-Americans have been complaining about police harassment for years.
We need effective strategies to combat sexual harassment in the workplace.
Some people stress the second syllable of harassment, while others stress the first.
The case has heightened public awareness of the problem of sexual harassment.
Making unwelcome suggestive remarks to a subordinate will be regarded as sexual harassment.
What he considers to be no more than errant conduct toward women would be regarded as sexual harassment by most people.
